What are the treatments for thrombocytopenia-absent radius syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of TAR syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Thrombocytopenia Absent Radius Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Radial aplasia-thrombocytopenia syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Skeletal Limb Abnormalities   These resources from Medli
